segments.text: I am seriously concerned about the boy's position on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's leaning precariously, its legs splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is stretched upward, his body completely off balance, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One swift movement or loss of grip could send him tumbling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hitting his head makes me very fearful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet floor from the overflowing sink only adds to the immense danger of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip and get seriously hurt, a very real possibility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm a bit angry that no one, especially the adult, is aware of these multiple hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is completely focused on her plate, oblivious to the dangers surrounding her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems like a serious accident is just waiting to happen here, it's inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster, with too many risks present.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are completely oblivious to the severity and immediate nature of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene and prevent potential injuries, to shout a warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a very stressful scene to observe, causing me considerable anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential consequences of these simultaneous oversights weigh heavily on me.
segments.speaker: PAR
